author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia tells EU gas supplies via Ukraine under no threat
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russiaâ€™s Energy Minister Alexander Novak assured European Commision Vice President Maros Sefcofic that the transit of natural gas to Europe via Ukraine was under no threat, his ministry said on Saturday.
Russian Energy Minister Alexander Novak addresses a news conference after an OPEC meeting in Vienna, Austria, November 30, 2017. REUTERS/Heinz-Peter Bader It said the transit is at no risk until Gazprom ( GAZP.MM ) and Ukrainian gas company Naftogaz fully terminate their contract, something that Gazprom has said it would seek to do.
Reporting by Vladimir Soldatkin; Writing by Andrey Ostroukh; Editing by Robin Pomeroy
